column8:
Margaret Thatcher is one of very few politicians worth admiring. In a world of political and fiscal incompetence, we mourn the passing of her kind. Someone more concerned with making hard choices rather than politically expedient ones.

This design shows Thatcher in a Warhol styled image and uses one of her many quotes, this one is: I am extraordinarily patient, provided I get my own way in the end."
column21: This design shows Thatcher in a Warhol styled image and uses one of her many quotes, this one is: I am extraordinarily patient, provided I get my own way in the end." A t shirt from a series to be found at weadmire.net.
